Footer.tagline: A unique experience in the heart of nature.

q1.question: How does payment work and do I need to carry a lot of cash?
q1.answer: When you book online with us, you pay for your stay 100% securely via a European payment gateway. You will only need cash for minor local expenses. Forget the stress of travelling with large amounts of money.

q2.question: Will I have internet connection at the house?
q2.answer: Yes. We know how important it is to stay connected. We have a stable WiFi network and 24H backup power so you can communicate with your family or work without relying on public networks.

q3.question: How do I get to Viñales from Havana or elsewhere in the country?
q3.answer: We take care of everything. We arrange secure transfers; from Havana by private taxi (120€) for four people or collective (25€) per person, right to our door.
